recipes.name: Moroccan Couscous
recipes.description: A traditional Moroccan dish made with semolina and vegetables.
recipes.steps:
1. Cook the semolina.
2. Prepare the vegetables.
3. Mix and serve.

recipes.name: Mexican Tacos
recipes.description: Delicious tacos filled with meat and fresh vegetables.
recipes.steps:
1. Cook the meat.
2. Fill the tortillas.
3. Add toppings and serve.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: The classic Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
recipes.steps:
1. Spread the dough.
2. Add the sauce.
3. Bake in the oven.

recipes.name: Japanese Sushi
recipes.description: Traditional sushi with vinegared rice and fresh fish.
recipes.steps:
1. Prepare the rice.
2. Roll the sushi.
3. Cut and serve.

recipes.name: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Thai stir-fried noodles with vegetables and shrimp.
recipes.steps:
1. Cook the noodles.
2. Stir-fry the vegetables.
3. Mix and serve.

recipes.name: American Burger
recipes.description: Classic burger with beef patty, cheese, and vegetables.
recipes.steps:
1. Cook the beef patty.
2. Assemble the burger.
3. Serve.

recipes.name: Chicken Tagine
recipes.description: Chicken slow-cooked with olives and preserved lemon.
recipes.steps:
1. Slow-cook the chicken.
2. Add olives.
3. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Falafel
recipes.steps:
1. Blend the chickpeas.
2. Form balls.
3. Fry.

recipes.name: Paella
recipes.description: Spanish rice with seafood and vegetables.
recipes.steps:
1. Cook the rice.
2. Add seafood.
3. Mix.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.description: Creamy chicken cooked with Indian spices.
recipes.steps:
1. Cook the chicken.
2. Add the sauce.
3. Let simmer.

recipes.name: Fish & Chips
recipes.description: Fried fish served with crispy fries.

1. Prepare the batter.
2. Fry the fish.
3. Serve with fries.

recipes.name: Shawarma
recipes.description: Middle Eastern sandwich filled with marinated meat.
recipes.steps:
1. Marinate the meat.
2. Cook.
3. Wrap in pita.
